title: The Killing of Freddie Gray, Addendum 11 â€“ Injured
description:
May 25, 2017 /  Addendum host D. Watkins is joined by Undisclosed: The Killing of Freddie Gray host Amelia McDonell-Parry, as well as guest panelists Tawanda Jones and Seth Stoughton. 
 
Episode scoring music by Patrick Cortes, Ramiro Marquez, Blue Dot Sessions, and FMG Dez.

Thank you to our most comfortable sponsor, Mack Weldon!
Get 20% off using promo code UNDISCLOSED when you go to www.mackweldon.com.
